Reference

All functions

barley_ex_data

Example datasets for the envirotyping package

check_trial_info() read_apsimx_report() get_hwsd2() impute() cv() fct_contr_sum() is_environmental_data() create_MET()

Hidden functions generally not to be directly called by the user

crossv_loo_grouped() crossv_mc_grouped() rapid_crossv()

Ancillary cross-validation functions

define_growth_stages()

Define crop growth stages

ec_matrix()

Create an environmental covariable matrix

ec_relmat()

Construct an environmental "relationship" matrix from environmental covariables

ec_variable_selection() ec_variable_selection_slide()

Select environmental covariables based on phenotype data

edit_environmental_data()

Edit environmental data

envirotyping

envirotyping: A package for obtaining useful environmental covariables for modeling in quantitative genetics and genomics

get_historical_weather_data()

Query public weather data over longer timeframes

get_soil_data()

Query soil data from the Harmonized World Soil Database

get_weather_data()

Query public weather data

hwsd.variables

Variable names from the Harmonic World Soil Database (HWSD)

lasso_fi()

Determine feature importance using the LASSO procedure

merge_environmental_data()

Merge environmental data

predict_historical_planting_dates()

Predict historical planting dates

run_apsim_crop_model()

Run APSIM crop model using current or historical weather data

stepwise_rfa()

Functions for environmental covariable selection

summarize_environmental_data()

Summarize environmental data according to growth stages

tidy.mmer()

Functions to enable genomic prediction using environmental data
